label.text: Menu says the destination of two first lanes.If that structure changes check if you have to change values.Each lane are separated with |.e.g.: through|through
label.ca.text: El menú et dirà la direcció dels dos primers carrils .Si aquesta estructura varia comprova si l'has de modificar.Cada carril va separat de |.Exemple: through|through
label.es.text: El menú te pondrá la dirección de los dos primeros carriles.Si esa estructura varía comprueba si debes modificar los carriles.Cada carril va separado de |.Ejemplo: through|through

label.text: You have to write the destination as you see on traffic signs on the way. Each lane has to be separated with |.e.g.: Barcelona|Tarragona
label.ca.text: Has d'escriure la destinació tal i com veus als senyals de trànsit de la via. Cada carril va separat de |.Exemple: Barcelona|Tarragona
label.es.text: Debes escribir la dirección tal y como la ves en las señales de tráfico de la vía. Cada carril va separado de |.Ejemplo: Barcelona|Tarragona

list_entry.short_description: Solid. Usually a paved or heavily compacted hardcore surface.
list_entry.ca.short_description: Pavimentat amb formigó, amb grava compacta també podria ser
list_entry.es.short_description: Pavimentado con hormigón, grava compacta también podría ser

list_entry.short_description: Mostly solid. Usually an unpaved track with surface of gravel mixed with a varying amount of sand, silt, and clay. See Wikipedia Gravel road on Wikipedia.
list_entry.ca.short_description: Sense pavimentar, però acondicionat , amb grava, per exemple.Practicable amb utilitari normal.
list_entry.es.short_description: Sin pavimentar, pero acondicionado , con gravilla por ejemplo.Practicable con utilitario normal.

list_entry.short_description: Even mixture of hard and soft materials. Almost always an unpaved track.
list_entry.ca.short_description: Sense pavimentar, mal acondicionat, practicable només amb 4x4
list_entry.es.short_description: Sin pavimentar, mal acondicionado, practicable sólo en 4x4

list_entry.short_description: Mostly soft. Almost always an unpaved track prominently with soil/sand/grass, but with some hard materials, or compressed materials mixed in.
list_entry.ca.short_description: Sense pavimentar, en mal estat, no practicable en vehicle.
list_entry.es.short_description: Sin pavimentar, en mal estado, no practicable en vehículo.

list_entry.short_description: Soft. Almost always an unpaved track lacking hard materials, uncompacted, subtle on the landscape, with surface of soil/sand/grass.
list_entry.ca.short_description: Sense pavimentar, amb traçat desdibuixat o no practicable.
list_entry.es.short_description: Sin pavimentar, con trazado desdibujado o no practicable.

label.text: Edit Path
label.ca.text: Propietats senders/corriols
label.es.text: Propiedades senderos

list_entry.short_description: Trail well cleared. Area flat or slightly sloped, no fall hazard
Trail with continuous line and balanced ascent. Terrain partially steep, fall hazard possible
exposed sites may be secured with ropes or chains, possible need to use hands for balance. Partly exposed sites with fall hazard, scree, pathless jagged rocks

list_entry.display_value: T4 - difficult, exposed, steep alpine trail
list_entry.short_description: sometimes need for hand use to get ahead. Terrain quite exposed, precarious grassy acclivities, jagged rocks, facile snow-free glaciers

list_entry.display_value: T5 - difficult alpine trail with climbing
list_entry.short_description: single plainly climbing up to second grade. Exposed, demanding terrain, jagged rocks, few dangerous glacier and snow

list_entry.display_value: T6 - hazardous alpine trail with climbing
list_entry.short_description: climbing up to second grade. Often very exposed, precarious jagged rocks, glacier with danger to slip and fall

text.text: Distancia que queda para el cruce
Distancia que queda para el cruce:b
